definition: eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)

sentences.english: The fish tangled in the mesh of the net has died.
sentences.chinese: 那條卡在網眼上的魚已經死了。

sentences.english: Combination net mesh and micro-mesh upper offer optimal drainage.
sentences.chinese: 組合網眼和微型網眼鞋面提供最佳的排水。

sentences.english: Combination net mesh and micro-mesh upper offer optimal drainage.
sentences.chinese: 組合網眼和微型網眼鞋面提供最佳的排水。

sentences.english: The queen-size bed is decorated with a handsome fishnet canopy.
sentences.chinese: 這張大號牀裝飾有一個手工編織的網眼頂罩。

sentences.english: Gaulish coat of chainmail, of a very fine mesh.
sentences.chinese: 一件鎖子甲制的高盧外衣，有很好網眼。

sentences.english: Breathable mesh lining for long-wear comfort.
sentences.chinese: 長期穿着舒適透氣網眼襯裏。

sentences.english: The pale cells distribute in the mesh.
sentences.chinese: 顏色淺的細胞分佈於網眼處。

sentences.english: Extremely breathable air-mesh upper with synthetic overlays for ultimate comfort.
sentences.chinese: 極致舒適的合成覆蓋極其透氣網眼鞋面。

sentences.english: Mesh lining with a cushioned footbed for added comfort.
sentences.chinese: 網眼襯裏一個更加舒適的氣墊鞋底。

sentences.english: The steel mesh undulates and moves through the structure like the passage of water.
sentences.chinese: 鋼網眼板象水流的移動一樣在結構上起伏排布。

sentences.english: One-piece open mesh upper with synthetic leather toe and heel cap for added protection.
sentences.chinese: 單件開放的網眼鞋面用合成革腳尖和腳跟增加保護帽。

definition: to take off costume and makeup/bottom garment (trousers etc)
